Package cycleguard.database.globalLeaderboards

Class GlobalLeaderboardsService

java.lang.Object
cycleguard.database.globalLeaderboards.GlobalLeaderboardsService
All Implemented Interfaces:
RideProcessable
@Service public class GlobalLeaderboardsService extends Object implements RideProcessable
Service wrapper for retrieving and modifying GlobalLeaderboards.

    • updateEntry

      private void updateEntry(GlobalLeaderboards leaderboard, LeaderboardEntry entry, boolean isPublic)
      Lazily updates the given GlobalLeaderboards with the given entry.
      Parameters:
      leaderboard - Leaderboard to update
      entry - Entry to insert or update
      isPublic - If the user's account is not public, remove any existing entries

    • processNewRide

      public void processNewRide(String username, ProcessRideService.RideInfo rideInfo, Instant now)
      Updates the user's position in the global leaderboards.
      Specified by:
      processNewRide in interface RideProcessable
      Parameters:
      username - User who completed ride
      rideInfo - Stats of completed ride
      now - Seconds since epoch when ride was completed
